mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questions(ques_no, gen_memberno, ques_title, ques_con, ques_date, ques_passwd) VALUES(questions_seq.nextval, #{gen_memberno}, #{ques_title}, #{ques_con}, sysdate, #{ques_passwd})
mapper.select: SELECT q.ques_no, q.gen_memberno, q.ques_title, q.ques_con, q.ques_date, q.ques_views, q.ques_passwd, gm.gen_name FROM questions q, gen_member gm WHERE q.gen_memberno = gm.gen_memberno ORDER BY q.ques_no DESC
